nodes.text: Following the death of Emperor Sheev Palpatine's death at the Battle of Endor, a joyous public rally broke out on Palpatine's homeworld of Naboo.

The rally on Naboo made its first appearance in the DVD version of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, in a redone sequence for the ending of the film, showing the Galaxy celebrating Emperor Palpatine's death.
